item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 3: The Irrational Quest for Everything
item.description: We chase impossible dreams. We hold contradictory beliefs. We want everything at once, even knowing we can’t have it. Parts 1 and 2 explored how AI systems approach functional understanding through confidence calibration and context-aware decision-making. But the most distinctively human behaviors aren’t the rational ones we can model. They’re the irrational ones we can’t.
